system.requirements:
Tier 3; Intelligence 35, Strong Minded 
Aptitudes: Defence, Intelligence
system.effect: When Character succeeds on an Opposed Willpower Test as part of a Psychic Power (either against an opponent or their own), they can spend a Fate Point to gain +Int Bonus Degrees of Success on the Opposed Test.

description.value: When Character succeeds on an Opposed Willpower Test as part of a Psychic Power (either against an opponent or their own), they can spend a Fate Point to gain +Int Bonus Degrees of Success on the Opposed Test.
